title: Pset_ValveTypePressureReducing
description:
Valve that reduces the pressure of a fluid immediately downstream of its position in a pipeline to a preselected value or by a predetermined ratio.
Note that a pressure reducing valve is constrained to have a 2 port  pattern.

UpstreamPressure.title: UpstreamPressure
UpstreamPressure.description: The operating pressure of the fluid upstream of the pressure reducing valve.

DownstreamPressure.title: DownstreamPressure
DownstreamPressure.description: The operating pressure of the fluid downstream of the pressure reducing valve.
